data.name: DESORDRE : A Puzzle Game Adventure
data.detailed_description:
DESORDRE is a solo first-person puzzle game inspired by the portal series but here each puzzle need to be solved by traveling through two timelines of the same room. You are helped by your portal gun and the possibility to slow down the time.

The timeline of the world is fractured. You appear to be the last person capable to repair the flow of the time. Each puzzle solved improve the temporal stability of the world.

Travel through two timelines !


To complete your mission we offer you a valuable tool : the possibility to travel between two timelines of the same environnement.
Each puzzle need to be think in 4 dimensions to be solved, every environnement is a new challenge !

Travel through portals !


Use you portal gun to travel through two portals, but think in 4 dimensions ! One portal can be placed in one dimension and the other portal in one other !

Slowdown the time


You can slowdown the time, this affect the player but also every object in the level. Combine each possibility of gameplay together and you can solve an impossible puzzle.

Powered by Unreal Engine 5

Desordre is made from the ground up with Unreal Engine 5 and use the last next gen tech such as : Nanite, Lumen, Chaos Physics, Temporal Super Resolution, and more...

data.short_description: DESORDRE is a solo first-person puzzle game each puzzle need to be solved by traveling through two timelines of the same room. You are helped by your portal gun and the possibility to slow down the time. Made by one person and powered by Unreal Engine 5.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon™ RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel™ Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500x
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 or AMD Radeon™ RX 6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
